description: Configuration file for ESLint in a Vue.js project using TypeScript, Vitest, and Prettier. It exports an ESLint configuration object with specific rules, file inclusions, and ignores for certain directories.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Function to define an ESLint configuration with Vue and TypeScript support.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs.recommended
methods.description: Preset configuration object for recommended Vue TypeScript ESLint rules.
